description: Official IDL extension for Visual Studio Code - a full-featured development environment for IDL (Interactive Data Language) with language server, notebooks, debugging, and more.

projectStructure.apps: Buildable entry points that produce executables
projectStructure.libs: Shared code imported by apps and other libs

keyPatterns.vscodeDependentLibs: MUST be in libs/vscode/ subdirectory for testing isolation
keyPatterns.codeGeneration: Many contribution points generated from TypeScript code rather than manually maintained
keyPatterns.languageServer: LSP architecture with client, server, and parsing worker components
